Package org.fcrepo.server.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DOObjectValidator
    Validator for digital objects (instances of DigitalObject, wrapped in a DOReader).
    DOValidator
    Validates a digital object.
    ValidationConstants
    Constants for validating Fedora objects and their components.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DOObjectValidatorModule
    A module for validating digital objects.
    DOValidatorImpl
    The implementation of the digital object validation module (see DOValidator.class and DOValidatorModule.class).
    DOValidatorModule
    Module Wrapper for DOValidatorImpl.
    DOValidatorSchematron
    Schematron validation for fedora objects encoded in schematron schema for Fedora.
    DOValidatorSchematronResult
    Schematron validation with FedoraRules schema as default.
    DOValidatorXMLErrorHandler  
    DOValidatorXMLSchema
    XML Schema validation for Digital Objects.
    RelsValidator
    Validates the RDF/XML content of the RELS-EXT and RELS-INT datastreams.
    ValidationUtility
    Misc validation-related functions.
